pages.text: The electric heater is not very efficient, each heater can heat up fluids at most 50Â°C.$(br2)The heating setpoint is configurable in the GUI and is redstone controllable, the sensor receiver can be placed directly on this block.$(br2)The electric heater has a cold (input) and hot (output) side, it is important that fluids respect this flow path.

The block can accept power from any non fluid side.$(br2)The electric heater will pass fluids through, meaning it's not necessary to have a pump extract fluids from this block. It's also possible to chain heaters in series.
